getting_started.title: Getting Started with Wplace Overlay
getting_started.description: Begin your wplace overlay journey with these simple steps to install and use TamperMonkey extension tools

steps.title: Install TamperMonkey
steps.description: Add the TamperMonkey extension to your browser for userscript management
details: TamperMonkey is a popular userscript manager that allows you to run custom scripts on websites
It's available for Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge browsers
The extension is free and safe to use

steps.title: Choose Your Tool
steps.description: Select the wplace overlay script that best fits your creative needs
details: We offer multiple overlay tools with different features and capabilities

Choose based on your specific requirements and technical preferences

steps.title: Install the Script
steps.description: Click the install button to add the wplace overlay script to TamperMonkey
details: Navigate to your chosen script's page (Greasy Fork or GitHub)
Click the 'Install' or 'Raw' button to open the script in TamperMonkey
Review the script permissions and click 'Install' in the TamperMonkey dialog
The script will be automatically enabled for wplace.live

steps.title: Start Creating
steps.description: Visit WPlace.live and begin your collaborative pixel art journey
details: Navigate to wplace.live in your browser
The overlay interface will automatically appear on the page
Upload your template image or import a JSON template
Position your template and start placing pixels collaboratively
tips: Use PNG images with transparent backgrounds for best results
Start with simple templates to familiarize yourself with the interface
Coordinate with your team using the template sharing features
Respect the site's terms of service and community guidelines

items.question: Is Wplace Overlay Pro free to use?
items.answer: Yes, Wplace Overlay Pro is completely free and open-source under the GPLv3 license.

items.question: Does this violate WPlace.live's Terms of Service?
items.answer: The script is designed to assist with pixel art creation while respecting WPlace.live's rules. Always ensure you comply with the site's Terms of Service and community guidelines.

items.question: Can I use this on mobile devices?
items.answer: Currently, Wplace Overlay Pro is optimized for desktop browsers, particularly Windows + Chrome. Mobile support is not available at this time.

items.question: How do I share templates with my team?
items.answer: Use the JSON export feature to create shareable template files. Team members can import these JSON files or use direct JSON links for coordination.

items.question: What image formats are supported?
items.answer: The script supports PNG images via direct links and local file uploads. For best results, use PNG format with transparent backgrounds.

items.question: Can I resize my templates?
items.answer: Yes, the script includes resize functionality with both simple scaling and dot-matching modes for optimal results.

items.question: How do I install TamperMonkey?
items.answer: Visit the TamperMonkey website or your browser's extension store, download and install the extension. It's available for Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge.

items.question: Which overlay tool should I choose?
items.answer: For beginners, we recommend Wplace Overlay Pro as it offers the most comprehensive features. Advanced users might prefer the open-source alternatives for customization.
